heading: HB07534
0: AN ACT PRESCRIBING THE PENALTIES FOR AN IMMEDIATE SUPERIOR OR SENIOR OFFICIAL OF AN AGENCY, PUBLIC OR PRIVATE, WHO DENIES APPLICATION FOR LEAVE OF ABSENCE BY A VICTIM - SURVIVOR OF VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN AS PROVIDED UNDER SECTION 42 ON THE IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS (IRR) OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9262, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ANTI-VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN AND THEIR CHILDREN ACT OF 2004, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE THE SAID LAW
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-12-10, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-12-11 and received by the Senate on 2018-12-11 Substituted by HB08655
